description:
Siegwald proposes to Lieselotte. Chiyono gets kidnapped by Kuon. As the game world and reality intersect, how will their stories of love and strife pan out in the end?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Saikou o Koeta Saikou no Happy End!
The Best Happy End to End All Happy Ends!
最高を超えた最高のハッピーエンド!
